Kooboo CMS help you build your website fast.

Easy to get start

Download and double click, everything is ready to go. After that, You have four ways to get start. For example, transfer public website by a url or use built in templates. Inline editing any page content, click anywhere to edit anything.

More wonderful features are in Kooboo Desktop

Click to run, local edit, site management, local database...
